General.Name: RMK Energy PT Tbk
General.Description: PT RMK Energy Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, provides coal logistic services in Indonesia. The company operates through coal sales and services segments. It also offers train loading and unloading services, port management, coal offtake and joint operation, and coal mining services. The company was founded in 2009 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT RMK Energy Tbk is a subsidiary of Pt Rmk Investama.
